verses.text: \w My|strong="H1732"\w* God, \w my|strong="H1732"\w* God, \w why|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H1732"\w* \w You|strong="H5921"\w* forsaken \w me|strong="H5921"\w*?\f + \fr 22:1 \ft Cited in Matthew 27:46 and Mark 15:34\f* \w Why|strong="H5921"\w* are \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w so|strong="H5921"\w* \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* saving \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w so|strong="H5921"\w* \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* words \w of|strong="H4210"\w* groaning?

\w I|strong="H1697"\w* cry \w out|strong="H4100"\w* by day, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5800"\w* God, \w but|strong="H5800"\w* \w You|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* not \w answer|strong="H1697"\w*, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* by night, \w but|strong="H5800"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* no rest.
\w Yet|strong="H3808"\w* \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3915"\w* holy, enthroned \w on|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* praises \w of|strong="H7121"\w* Israel.

\w In|strong="H3427"\w* \w You|strong="H8416"\w* \w our|strong="H3478"\w* fathers trusted; \w they|strong="H3478"\w* trusted \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w You|strong="H8416"\w* delivered \w them|strong="H3427"\w*.
They cried out to You and were set free; they trusted in You and were not disappointed.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am \w a|strong="H3068"\w* worm \w and|strong="H2199"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man, scorned \w by|strong="H3808"\w* men \w and|strong="H2199"\w* despised \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w*.
All \w who|strong="H5971"\w* see \w me|strong="H2781"\w* mock \w me|strong="H2781"\w*; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* sneer \w and|strong="H5971"\w* shake \w their|strong="H3808"\w* heads:

“\w He|strong="H3605"\w* trusts \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, let \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* deliver \w him|strong="H7200"\w*; let \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* rescue \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, since \w He|strong="H3605"\w* delights \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*.”\f + \fr 22:8 \ft Cited in Matthew 27:43\f*

\w Yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w* forth \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* womb; \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w made|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w* secure \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* mother’s breast.

\w From|strong="H5921"\w* \w birth|strong="H1518"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* was cast \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*; \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* mother’s womb \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* been \w my|strong="H5921"\w* God.

Be not \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* trouble is \w near|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H7358"\w* there is no one \w to|strong="H5921"\w* help.
Many bulls surround \w me|strong="H4480"\w*; strong bulls \w of|strong="H4480"\w* Bashan encircle \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.
They open \w their|strong="H5437"\w* jaws against \w me|strong="H5437"\w* \w like|strong="H7227"\w* lions \w that|strong="H7227"\w* roar \w and|strong="H6499"\w* maul.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* am poured \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* water, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* bones \w are|strong="H6310"\w* disjointed. \w My|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w is|strong="H6310"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* wax; \w it|strong="H5921"\w* melts away \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w strength|strong="H6106"\w* \f + \fr 22:15 \ft MT; or My mouth, a possible reading of the original Hebrew text \f* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* dried \w up|strong="H8210"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* potsherd, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* tongue sticks \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* roof \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* mouth. \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w lay|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dust \w of|strong="H4325"\w* death.

\w For|strong="H6083"\w* dogs surround \w me|strong="H8239"\w*; \w a|strong="H3068"\w* band \w of|strong="H4194"\w* evil men encircles \w me|strong="H8239"\w*; \w they|strong="H3581"\w* \w have|strong="H4194"\w* pierced \w my|strong="H3581"\w* hands \w and|strong="H6083"\w* feet.\f + \fr 22:16 \ft DSS, LXX, Vulgate, and Syriac; most MT like a lion at my hands and feet\f*

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* can count \w all|strong="H5437"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* bones; \w they|strong="H3588"\w* stare \w and|strong="H3027"\w* gloat \w over|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H5437"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* divide \w my|strong="H3605"\w* garments \w among|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* cast lots \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* clothing.\f + \fr 22:18 \ft Cited in John 19:24; see also Matthew 27:35, Mark 15:24, and Luke 23:34\f*

\w But|strong="H1992"\w* \w You|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w be|strong="H3830"\w* \w not|strong="H5307"\w* \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w*; \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* Strength, \w come|strong="H5307"\w* quickly \w to|strong="H5921"\w* help \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

Deliver \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sword, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* precious life \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* power \w of|strong="H3068"\w* wild dogs.

\w Save|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w mouth|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* lion; \w at|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* horns \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* wild oxen \w You|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* answered \w me|strong="H5315"\w*!

I \w will|strong="H6310"\w* proclaim \w Your|strong="H3467"\w* name \w to|strong="H6310"\w* \w my|strong="H3467"\w* brothers; I \w will|strong="H6310"\w* praise \w You|strong="H3467"\w* \w in|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* assembly.\f + \fr 22:22 \ft LXX I will sing Your praises in the assembly; cited in Hebrews 2:12.\f*

\w You|strong="H8432"\w* who fear \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w Him|strong="H8034"\w*! All descendants \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H5608"\w*, \w honor|strong="H8034"\w* \w Him|strong="H8034"\w*! All offspring \w of|strong="H8034"\w* Israel, revere \w Him|strong="H8034"\w*!

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3373"\w* despised \w or|strong="H4480"\w* detested \w the|strong="H3605"\w* torment \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* afflicted. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3373"\w* hidden \w His|strong="H3605"\w* face \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w but|strong="H3513"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* attended \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* cry \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w help|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w My|strong="H8085"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* resounds \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w great|strong="H6440"\w* assembly; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* fulfill \w my|strong="H8085"\w* vows \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w who|strong="H6041"\w* \w fear|strong="H6440"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3373"\w* poor \w will|strong="H7227"\w* eat \w and|strong="H8416"\w* \w be|strong="H5088"\w* satisfied; those \w who|strong="H7227"\w* seek \w the|strong="H3373"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H7227"\w* \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* \w Him|strong="H5048"\w*. \w May|strong="H6951"\w* \w your|strong="H7999"\w* hearts live forever!

\w All|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ends \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth \w will|strong="H3068"\w* remember \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w turn|strong="H3824"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w All|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* families \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* nations \w will|strong="H3068"\w* bow down \w before|strong="H2421"\w* \w Him|strong="H1984"\w*.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* dominion belongs \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* rules \w over|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* rich \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth \w will|strong="H3068"\w* feast \w and|strong="H3068"\w* worship; \w all|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3068"\w* \w down|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* dust \w will|strong="H3068"\w* kneel before \w Him|strong="H3068"\w*— \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* unable \w to|strong="H3068"\w* preserve \w their|strong="H3068"\w* lives.

Posterity \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w serve|strong="H6440"\w* \w Him|strong="H6440"\w*; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* declare \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* new generation.

\w They|strong="H5608"\w* \w will|strong="H2233"\w* come \w and|strong="H5647"\w* \w proclaim|strong="H5608"\w* \w His|strong="H5647"\w* righteousness \w to|strong="H1755"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* people yet unborn— \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w that|strong="H1755"\w* \w He|strong="H2233"\w* \w has|strong="H2233"\w* \w done|strong="H5647"\w*.
